Empty Value Household Particulars Whether LPG gas connection is available in the Household? If Yes, then number of times the cylider is refilled in last one year Whether electricity connection is available in the household? If Yes, whether the household has LED Bulbs under UJALA yojana (Unnat Jyoti by Affordable LEDs for All) ? Does any member of the household have PM Jan Dhan Account ? Whether the household is enrolled under PM Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana ? Whether any member of the household is enrolled under PM Suraksha Bima Yojana ? whether any member of the household has been immunised under Mission Indra-Dhanush ? Is there any child (0-6 yrs.) or pregnant woman available in the household ? Whether any member of the household is a member of the Self Help Group (SHG) under DAY - NRLM If No, whether the household has ever availed the nutrition benefits under ICDS? If Yes, please check the services availed under ICDS What is the type of House used by the household for living? If yes, whether any member of the household registered in ICDS ? Whether the household is a beneficiary of the Pradhan Mantri Awaas Yojana - Gramin ? If Yes, please provide the status

Smartphone can not be Yes if Main source of lighting is not Electricity or Solar. Select ownership status Houseless can not be selected if house no. is available. Parliament Constituency Assembly Constituency If more than one AC, enter name of constituency Total Population Male Female Total Household Number of households engaged majorly in Farm activities Number of households engaged majorly in Non-Farm activities Availability of government seed centres If not available in the village; the distance to the nearest place where facility is available Whether this village is a part of the Watershed Development Project Availability of Community Rain Water Harvesting System/Pond/Dam/Check Dam etc. Does the village has any Farmers Collective Availability of warehouse for food grain storage If not available in the village, the distance to the nearest warehouse for food grain storage Availability of Primary Processing facilities at the village level Does the village have access to Custom Hiring Centre (Agri-equipments) (Note: If in acre, divide by 2.47 to get value in hectare) Total Cultivable Area (in hectares) Net sown Area (in ha) Kharif………….(In hectares) Rabi………….(In hectares) Other………..(In hectares) Availability of soil testing centres If not available in the village, the distance to the nearest soil testing centre Availability of fertilizer shop If not available in the village, the distance to the nearest fertilizer shop Main Source of irrigation Number of farmers using drip/sprinkler irrigation Area irrigated (in ha) Total Unirrigated Land Area (in ha) Does the village have Livestock Extension services Availability of Milk Collection Centre /Milk routes / Chilling Centres Any Project supporting Poultry Development Any Project supporting Goatary Development Any Project supporting Pigery Development Availability of Veterinary Clinic or Hospital If not available in the village, the distance to the nearest Veterinary Clinic or Hospital Pisciculture - InLand Fishery/Coastal Fishery/Any Other Community Ponds Used for Fisheries Extension facilities for Aquaculture If not available in the village, the distance to the nearest Extension facilities No of household with kuccha wall and kuccha roof About Kuccha Wall, Roof Kuccha Wall/Roof -- Kuccha Wall --
 1. Grass/thatch/bamboo etc.
 2. Plastic/polythene. 
 3. Mud/unburnt brick 
 4. Wood 
 5. Stone not packed with mortar

Hand made tiles No of Households who have got a PMAY House (completed or sanctioned) No of Households who are in the Permanent Wait List No. of Households who got benefit from any State Specific Housing Scheme No. of Households who are in the Permanent Wait List of State Specific Housing Scheme Availability of Piped tap water If not covered in the village; the distance to the nearest Piped tap water facility Whether the village is connected to All weather road If not connected, the distance to the nearest all weather road Whether village has internal pucca roads (cc/ brick road) Availability of Public Transport If not available in the village, the distance to the nearest Public Transport facility Availability of Railway Station If not available in the village, the distance to the nearest Railway Station Availability of electricity for domestic use (in Hrs) Number of Households availing the benefits under Saubhagya Scheme Availability of Electricity Supply to MSME Units Use of Solar Energy/Wind Energy for electrification of the house If yes, Number of Households electrified by Solar Energy/Wind Energy Availability of Panchayat Bhawan Is there a Common Service Centre (CSC) in the village Availability of Public Information Board under People's Plan Campaign Common pastures as per revenue records Number of Households availing benefits of Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY) Availability of Public Library If not available in the village, the distance to the nearest Public Library Availability of recreational centre/Sports Playground etc. Availability of banks If bank is not available in the village; the distance to the nearest bank Availability of Business Correspondent with internet connectivity? Availability of ATM If not available in the village; the distance to the nearest ATM Number of households having Jan-Dhan bank account Availability of Post office / Sub-Post office If not available in the village; the distance to the nearest Post Office Availability of Telephone Services Availability of Internet/BroadBand Facility Availability of Public Distribution System(PDS) If not available in the village; the distance to the nearest Public Distribution System (PDS) facility Number of Households having BPL ration cards Availability of Primary School With electricity With toilet With Computer Lab Play Ground Drinking Water Availability of mid day meal scheme Number of Students in primary School(s) Number of Teachers in primary School(s) If Primary School is not available in the village; the distance to the nearest Primary School Availability of Middle School If Middle School is not available in the village; the distance to the nearest Middle School Availability of High School If High School is not available in the village; the distance to the nearest High School Availability of Higher/Senior Secondary School If Higher/Senior Secondary School is not available in the village; the distance to the nearest Higher/Senior Secondary School No.of Children not attending the school Availability of Degree College If Degree College is not available in the village; the distance to the nearest Degree College Number of Graduates/Post Graduates in the Village Availability of Vocational Training Centre/Polytechnic/ITI/RSETI /DDU-GKY If not available in the village, the distance to the nearest Vocational Training Centre/Polytechnic/ITI/RSETI /DDU-GKY Availability of markets If not available in the village, the distance to the nearest market Availability of Sub centre / PHC/ CHC If not available in the village; the distance to the nearest CHC/PHC/Sub centre Availability of Jan Aushadhi Kendra No. of Households registered for health insurance services under Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PMJAY)/State specific Health Insurance Schemes Distance to the nearest hospital empaneled under PMJAY/State specific Health Insurance Schemes Availability of drainage facilities Community waste disposal system Total no of household using clean energy (LPG/Bio gas) Community bio gas or recycle of waste Is the village Open Defacation Free(ODF) Availability Of Aanganwadi Centre If not available in the village; the distance to the nearest Aanganwadi Centre Is Early Childhood Education provided in the Anganwadi Total no of children in the age group of 0-3 years in the village Total no of children aged 0-3 years registered in Aanganwadi Total no of children aged 3-6 years registered in Aanganwadi No of children aged 0-3 years immunized Number of children categorized as Non-Stunted as per ICDS record No. of Anemic Pregnant Women No. of Anemic Adolescent Girls No. of children under the age of 6 years who are underweight No of Male Children (0-6 Years) No of Female Children (0-6 Years) Number of SC/ST/OBC/Minority Children getting Scholarship Number of SC/ST/OBC/Minority households which received bank Loans No. of physically challenged persons who received implants and appliances Number of Households with more than 2 Children Availability of Mother and Child Health facilities If not available in the village, distance to the nearest Mother and Child Health facilities Number of Households getting pensions under National Social Assistance Programme(NSAP) (Old Age/Disability/Widow/National Family Benefit Scheme (NFBS) Number of Self Help Groups (SHGs) No. of households mobilized into SHGs If { %1$s } is { %2$s } then 

Number of SHGs federated into Village Organisations (VOs) No. of households mobilized into Producer Groups No. of SHGs which accessed bank loans Bee Keeping Availability of Sericulture Availability of Handloom Handicrafts Availability of Community Forest Availability of minor forest produce Number of Households where only source of livelihood is minor forest production Availability of cottage and small scale units (Fabrication/Construction material/Dairy based/Textile etc.) units Number of Households engaged in such units Availability of Adult Education Centre If not available in the village, distance to the nearest Adult Education Centre
Total number of registered children in Anganwadi Total number of children (0-6 years) immunized under ICDS Total number of Pregnant women No of pregnant women receiving services* under ICDS Total number of lactating mothers No of lactating mothers receiving services under ICDS Total no of women delivered babies at the hospitals who are registered with ASHA Anganwadi workers Total no of children in ICDS Common Application Software No of young anemic children in ICDS Common Application Software (6-59 months) Total number of newly born children during the year 2018-19 No of newly born children underweight No of households not having sanitary latrines Total no of eligible beneficiaries under Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana No of beneficiaries receiving benefits under Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana Total no. of eligible beneficiaries under Aayushman Bharat-Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana or any State Govt Health scheme No. of beneficiaries receiving benefits under Aayushman Bharat-Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana or any State Govt Health scheme Total number of eligible households under National Food Security Act (NFSA) Total no of households receiving food grains from Fair Price Shops Total number of farmers registered under Pradhan Mantri Kisan Pension Yojana (PMKPY) Total number of farmers in the age of 18-40 years subscribed to Pradhan Mantri Kisan Pension Yojana (PMKPY) Total no of farmers No of farmers received benefits under PMFBY No of farmers adopted organic farming during 2018-19 Number of farmers received the soil testing report Total no of elected representatives No of elected representatives undergone refresher training under Rashtriya Gram Swaraj Abhiyan No of elected representatives oriented under Rashtriya Gram Swaraj Abhiyan Total approved Labour Budget for the year 2018-19 Total expenditure approved under NRM in the Labour Budget for the year 2018-19 Total area covered under irrigation (drip, sprinkler)(in ha.) Export Offline : Alert Export Offine : Info No Gram Panchayat data to be exported on this device Please final submit all the villages before export. It is advised that the data should be uploaded online directly to the server using the 'upload Online' functionality. 

 The 'Export' functionality is provided to create offline data file in the local mobile at location "File (Manager/Explorer)/internal_storage/mission_antyodaya" 
 You will be required to transfer the offline file to a broadband connected machine and upload these files to the server using the URL "http://missionantyodaya.nic.in".
